Milan, from Correa to Everton Soares: the latest
Correa and Everton are the two attackers that Milan is evaluating, as the rossoneri are looking to purchase one of the two to add firepower to Gianpaolo's squad. Milan are looking at buying one or the other, with no other alternatives. Regarding Correa: on Friday there were contacts made through Boban but no deal has been reached.

Regarding Everton Soares, Milan is facing serious complications in the deal, starting with a gulf beteween the sides over the asking price for the Gremio forward: €35m plus add-ons. There were contacts made Friday morning, confirmed by the rossoneri directors, who denied rumors from Brazil that Gremio turned down a €30m offer the other day. Milan are trying to land their newest attacker, but there are complications to achieveing that goal.
